English: lower part of stream, worth attention
wave, to be flat and wide
take responsibility, to be able to cut
to lie in a hole, to be ashamed
to catch fish with a net
hairlock on the temples, hair on temples
sheep skin without hair, to be exhausted
hair attached to a metal ring
foal up to one year old
to cut off pieces, to be greedy
to be unable to get up
whispering, swamped forest, perspiration of feet
